#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
 
long long int mpow(long long base, long long exp) {
	long long int result=1;
	while(exp) {
	if(exp&1) 
		result*=base;
	base*=base;
	exp>>=1;
	}
	return result;
}
 
int main() {
	long long i,t,ln,f,n,x;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--) {
		f=0;
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		ln=(long long int)round(log(n)/log(2));
		for(i=2;i<=ln;i++) {
			x=(long long int)round(pow(n,1.0/i));
			if(mpow(x,i)==n) {
				f=1;
				break;
			}
		}
		if(f==1) 
			printf("YES\n");
		else
			printf("NO\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
